participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: George is a passionate and hardworking individual who enjoys the simple pleasures in life. He has a great sense of humor and is quite expressive, often using strong language to convey his emotions.
participant_1.background: my favorite food is papaya. i married a super model from italy. i have zero family that i'm close to. i am a bee farmer. my name is george.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Linda is a resilient and creative woman who is full of life. She has a nurturing spirit and loves to connect with her family, often sharing stories and experiences with them.
participant_2.background: i can sew my own clothes. i had cancer but its gone now. i'm retired and living the great life. i have amazing children and grandchildren.
